name: Stability
description: Stability is a puzzle game where you should safely land a rocket overcoming different obstacles. Be aware of lazers, solve puzzles, take care of fuel level and your speed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
